content: When you want to sell hot dogs in the ball park, you pay a concession fee to the ball-park's owner. When you want to profit from selling in the European Economic Community market, you pay what to whom?
translations: ita:Quando vuoi vendere hot dog nel campo da baseball, paghi una tassa di concessione al proprietario del campo da baseball
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by halfb1t (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
